CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic devices were fabricated using PFDTBT , PFD2TBT and the ter-polymers as p - type electron donors and by using [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as an n - type acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT - This is a "Material Name" entity. It is a type of p-type electron donor used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
2. PFD2TBT - This is another "Material Name" entity. It is also a type of p-type electron donor used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
3. ter-polymers - This is a general term for a type of material, and it is unclear from the context what specific ter-polymers are being referred to. Therefore, I cannot definitively say whether this is a "Material Name" entity.
4. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) - This is a "Material Name" entity. It is an n-type acceptor used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
